title: Crimea bridge attack arrests
description: Russia detains eight over Saturday's incident as NATO leaders meet to discuss more help for Ukraine. Also: TikTok profits from livestreams of Syrian refugees, Peru's embattled president faces fresh legal battle and the first discovery of microplastics in hailstones.
itunes:subtitle: Russia detains eight over Saturday's incident
itunes:summary: Russia detains eight over Saturday's incident as NATO leaders meet to discuss more help for Ukraine. Also: TikTok profits from livestreams of Syrian refugees, Peru's embattled president faces fresh legal battle and the first discovery of microplastics in hailstones.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
